```{r}
library(tidytuesdayR)
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)
library(lubridate)
library(zoo)
```

```{r}
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2020, week = 45)
```

```{r}
ikeacsv <- tuesdata$ikea
ikeacsv
```

```{r}
ikeacsv %>% 
  count(designer, sort = TRUE) %>% 
  filter(n > 100) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(reorder(designer, n), n)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", fill = "turquoise4") +
  coord_flip()+
  labs(y = "",
       x = "",
       title = "IKEA had done more designs for its stores than any other designer",
       subtitle = "Count of designs sold in IKEA by designer") +
  theme_classic()
```
